name: Babylon's Burning Bastion
description:
The foreseen last day has come. A last desperate attempt of this green guardian to protect its bastion from the upcoming fire destruction. Its tree sisters only count with him in the final moments in the deeps from the Babylon’s garden.

A casual game which you need to stop the fire from consuming the trees by alocating your presence above the flamable spots. Be fast before all trees are burnt!
